DOC.brief_summary: This study test preschooler , school child , youth young adult , born preterm full-term , theory mind ability .
DOC.brief_title: Theory Mind Preschool Children , School Children , Youths Adults Born Preterm Full-term
DOC.detailed_description: Is difference development theory mind preterms full-terms ? Is risk group preterms develop deficit theroy mind ? Four group test : prescoolers ( two year later ) , youths young adult . All participant test theory mind , executive function , language cognitive abilites .
DOC.criteria: informed consent preterm : birthweight < 1500g fullterm : born 38 week inform consent
